summary: Extended Artifacts adds new unique artifacts to Skyrim and reworks some of vanilla items. Goal of this mod is to add more variety to playstyles in the game with the help of different unique artifacts with lorefriendly story and not overpowered stats.
descriptionHtml:
ABOUT

Artifacts integrated in quests

Artifacts integrated in the world

Reworked Vanilla artifacts

BEST EXAMPLES

Paladin armor

Ancient Mystic Dawn robe

ITS BETTER TO PLAY WITH REQUIEM

LIST OF ARTIFACTS
Grade 1
Grade 2
Grade 3
author: Sayso
